report.title: View Data
report.description: Report to display the View Data page on Earthworm Watch, excludes location information. Note, the report directly displays sample.recorder_names, this is fine for this project as this just contains a nickname and isn't exposing the user's name when it shouldn't
report.query:
SELECT #columns# FROM samples s LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values pitNumAttr ON pitNumAttr.sample_id=s.id AND pitNumAttr.sample_attribute_id=#s1AttrID# AND pitNumAttr.deleted=false
JOIN cache_occurrences co on co.sample_id=s.id and co.survey_id=s.survey_id and co.website_id in (#website_ids#) JOIN occurrence_attribute_values gridIdAttr ON gridIdAttr.occurrence_id=co.id AND gridIdAttr.occurrence_attribute_id=#grid_id_attr_id# AND gridIdAttr.deleted=false
LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values countPaleAttr ON countPaleAttr.occurrence_id=co.id AND co.taxa_taxon_list_id=#pale_taxa_taxon_list_id# AND countPaleAttr.occurrence_attribute_id=#occ_count_attr_id# AND countPaleAttr.deleted=false LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values countShortAttr ON countShortAttr.occurrence_id=co.id AND co.taxa_taxon_list_id=#short_taxa_taxon_list_id# AND countShortAttr.occurrence_attribute_id=#occ_count_attr_id# AND countShortAttr.deleted=false LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values countLongAttr ON countLongAttr.occurrence_id=co.id AND co.taxa_taxon_list_id=#long_taxa_taxon_list_id# AND countLongAttr.occurrence_attribute_id=#occ_count_attr_id# AND countLongAttr.deleted=false LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values countAdultAttr ON countAdultAttr.occurrence_id=co.id AND (gridIdAttr.text_value='#adult_top_soil_grid_name#' OR gridIdAttr.text_value='#adult_mustard_grid_name#') AND countAdultAttr.occurrence_attribute_id=#occ_count_attr_id# AND countAdultAttr.deleted=false LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values countImmatureAttr ON countImmatureAttr.occurrence_id=co.id AND (gridIdAttr.text_value='#immature_top_soil_grid_name#' OR gridIdAttr.text_value='#immature_mustard_grid_name#') AND countImmatureAttr.occurrence_attribute_id=#occ_count_attr_id# AND countImmatureAttr.deleted=false LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values countTopSoilAttr ON countTopSoilAttr.occurrence_id=co.id AND (gridIdAttr.text_value='#adult_top_soil_grid_name#' OR gridIdAttr.text_value='#immature_top_soil_grid_name#') AND countTopSoilAttr.occurrence_attribute_id=#occ_count_attr_id# AND countTopSoilAttr.deleted=false LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values countMustardAttr ON countMustardAttr.occurrence_id=co.id AND (gridIdAttr.text_value='#adult_mustard_grid_name#' OR gridIdAttr.text_value='#immature_mustard_grid_name#') AND countMustardAttr.occurrence_attribute_id=#occ_count_attr_id# AND countMustardAttr.deleted=false LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values countAttr ON countAttr.occurrence_id=co.id AND countAttr.occurrence_attribute_id=#occ_count_attr_id# AND countAttr.deleted=false
JOIN sample_attribute_values moistAttr ON moistAttr.sample_id=s.id AND moistAttr.sample_attribute_id=#moisture_attr_id# AND moistAttr.deleted=false JOIN termlists_terms ttMoist on ttMoist.id = moistAttr.int_value AND ttMoist.deleted=false JOIN terms tMoist on tMoist.id = ttMoist.term_id AND tMoist.deleted=false JOIN sample_attribute_values textureAttr ON textureAttr.sample_id=s.id AND textureAttr.sample_attribute_id=#texture_attr_id# AND textureAttr.deleted=false JOIN termlists_terms ttTexture on ttTexture.id = textureAttr.int_value AND ttTexture.deleted=false JOIN terms tTexture on tTexture.id = ttTexture.term_id AND tTexture.deleted=false JOIN sample_attribute_values colourAttr ON colourAttr.sample_id=s.id AND colourAttr.sample_attribute_id=#colour_attr_id# AND colourAttr.deleted=false JOIN termlists_terms ttColour on ttColour.id = colourAttr.int_value AND ttColour.deleted=false JOIN terms tColour on tColour.id = ttColour.term_id AND tColour.deleted=false
JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.id = #survey_id# and su.deleted=false JOIN websites w on w.id=su.website_id and w.deleted=false WHERE #website_filter# AND s.deleted=false AND ((co.training=false AND #training_records#!=1) or (co.training=true AND #training_records#=1))

param.name: s1AttrID
param.description: The ID of the sample attribute that links pit 2 to the first

param.name: moisture_attr_id
param.description: The ID of the attribute that holds the recorded soil moisture.

param.name: texture_attr_id
param.description: The ID of the attribute that holds the recorded soil texture.

param.name: colour_attr_id
param.description: The ID of the attribute that holds the recorded soil colour.

param.name: occ_count_attr_id
param.description: The ID of the attribute that holds the Earthworm count.

param.name: grid_id_attr_id
param.description: The ID of the attribute that holds the id of the grid. There are 4 grids for different life stages and before/after mustard water added.

param.name: adult_top_soil_grid_name
param.description: Name given to the adult top soil grid

param.name: immature_top_soil_grid_name
param.description: Name given to the immature top soil grid

param.name: adult_mustard_grid_name
param.description: Name given to the adult mustard grid

param.name: immature_mustard_grid_name
param.description: Name given to the immature mustard grid
